channel.title: Making Commands
channel.description:
Heya everyone im trying to make a command for my up comming server (my first one) I got Voule Command Generatore i took it from another source and put it in the source im using atm and umm i made the command and the coords where it will take me and i generated the code. Now i only got 1 question for you all, Where would i put that code so in-game i will be able to use that command to teleport to where i want to teleport...? just please anyone tell me where i put that code then ill thank you after im done with all my commands ill start editing npcs then eventually release my new server/client. then ill be releasing the source. first i need help with this one problem.
Thanks,
Masterth1ef

item.title: Making Commands
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

ok when you got the code copied open client.java and search for any other code you have such as master etc. right below or above doesn’t really matter post the code.

Read full topic
